title: Hot cabbage and grape coleslaw
ingredients: ['200 g (7 oz) mixed salad leaves, including frisée', '3 tbsp chopped fresh herbs, preferably chives, tarragon and parsley', '1 tbsp walnut oil', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '125 g (4½ oz) celeriac', '1 tbsp lemon juice', '1 Asian pear', '5 shallots, chopped', '200 g (7 oz) white cabbage, finely shredded', '4 tbsp red wine vinegar', '125 g (4½ oz) seedless green grapes, halved', '125 g (4½ oz) seedless red grapes, halved', '45 g (1½ oz) walnut pieces', 'salt and pepper']
